caption.text:
Most of my 2D inversion and Möbius transformation demos use an annulus (ring) as the initial set, as it maintains its overall shape under inversion. In 3D, the spherical shell is a natural equivalent. However, one can also use a ring in 3D, or more properly a torus, for a nice 3D solid. Here are some Möbius iterations of such a ring.
